data.text: @pnvaldes In order to deactive these broken mailing, provide us your email address by DM. Regards.
@VictorJemio1 Hello, please send us via DM your bags reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you further. Regards.

Are you sure you have all the necessary documents to travel?
Find the forms you must present when entering your destination country and complete them before heading to the airport.
Confirm them at https://t.co/IjJIlU7Y4T https://t.co/RssPHYk495

data.text: @Daniishe We just verified you have received response by email related to the protocol case 34164479, take into account this information provided, according to our policy of exchanges and returns. Regards.

@TinaPalaguachi Hello, please send us via DM your membership number, full name, date of birth, email, residence country, and last movement in your LATAM Pass account to check this with you further. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@Daniishe We will be waiting for your response via DM. Regards.

@Daniishe Hello, in order to assist you though this means, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@DKMS_cl Para nosotros siempre será un honor brindar oportunidades que lleven esperanza a miles de niños, niñas y adolescentes. Transformar vidas es #EsoQueNosHaceVolar ✈

@ChiAlma We have verified that your case is still being worked on by our specialized area. It is due to the large number of requests that the resolution time has been extended. As soon as we have an update, we'll let you know through email. Regards.
@ChiAlma Hello, we can check your case is still in process, once the department in charge has updates on this, you will be contacted by email. Regards.
@PPReacaFla2 Hi, we provide assistance in English, Spanish or Portuguese, please chose one of those languages in order to assist you. Thank you.
@JoeSchrider1 Hello, pleased to greet you. We ask you to delete this personal information from public comment, and send it us through DM in order to assist you properly. We stay tuned. Regards.
@ppppppdrin Bear in mind, provide us this information by DM. Regards.
@ppppppdrin Hello, thank you for reaching out, please provide us your reservation code and the full name of the passenger, by this way we can check your flight status. Regards.
@tessarrific Hi, we have sent you a DM. Regards.
@tessarrific Please confirm the passenger's name via DM. If possible, we kindly ask you to delete the last tweet since it contains private information. We will stay tuned.
@tessarrific We will be waiting for your response in order to check the flight's status or the options for cancellations or changes. Regards.

@tessarrific Hello, in order to assist through this means, please provide us via DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@tutationn Hola, envianos de manera detallada tu solicitud vía DM para realizar las respectivas validaciones. Gracias por escribirnos. Saludos.
@johnv_30 Hola, te hemos escrito por DM. Saludos.
@ClaudiaMAlarcon Hello, we've responded you through DM. Regards.

@alealori Hola Alejandro, en el sistema nos registra que tienes el caso 34233068. Revisaremos tu solicitud y te brindaremos respuesta por medio de los datos de contacto registrados en el caso. Saludos.

Is your trip coming up or are you planning to travel soon? Review these important mandatory requirements so you can travel safely. Read this #ChecklistLATAM carefully and learn everything you need to know for your next flight https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp https://t.co/iIlna3oo9i

data.text: @BackhomeLC Hi, we have sent you a message trough DM. Regards.
@Marcossaieg Comprendemos lo que nos indicas, sin embargo, seguiremos insistiendo en tu caso para brindarte una pronta respuesta. Saludos.

@Marcossaieg Hola, te informamos que hemos revisado tu cuenta y notamos que cuentas con un caso abierto, el cual es 34061060, por tal motivo hemos dejado tus comentarios, para que así se tenga certeza de tu requerimiento. En cuanto tengamos alguna novedad, nos estaremos contactando. Saludos.

@Franaranjoo Hello, please send us via DM your booking reference (6 letters), ticket number (13 digits) and full name of the passenger to check this with you further. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@billyleeblack16 Hello, we kindly ask you to delete your comment since it contains personal information (booking code) and contact us through DM. Regards.
@NuritaVM Hi, please send us your booking code (6 letters) along with the passengers' full names, so that we check your ticket's change regulations. We look forward to your response. Kind regards.

@D1360F1 Hello, please send us via DM your booking reference (6 letters), ticket number (13 digits) and full name of the passenger to check this with you further. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.

@themadalena Hello, pleased to greet you. In order to assist you, send us through DM the reservation code (six uppercase letters) and/or electronic ticket number with the full name of one of the passengers. We'll be aware of your response. Regards.
@gianinita You are very welcome Gianina. In case you need anything else, do not hesitate in writing us back. Regards.
@futbolmasorg ¡Estamos felices de ser parte de esta alianza! Seguiremos apoyándolos para contribuir con esta hermosa iniciativa, y que juntos podamos llevar sueños a lo más alto 💙❤️✈️

@gianinita Hello, in order to assist you through this means, please provide us vía DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@Adxpillar Hello, we just responded you through DM. Regards.
@HasanDiwan2 Hasan, we received your reply. We will continue to assist you through direct message. Regards.

@HasanDiwan2 Hi Hasa, thanks for contacting us. Please provide us with the dates of the entire itinerary, and the full name of all passengers in the booking, in order to find your reservation code. For your security, please do this through direct message. We await your reply.

@gatoibu Hola, entendemos tu molestia, pero verificamos que tu caso continua en proceso, por ello, hemos procedido a dejar los registros respectivos para así poder agilizar la gestión, en cuanto tengamos una respuesta nos comunicaremos a tu correo electrónico. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

Is your flight coming up or are you thinking about traveling soon? All the information you need to know about government restrictions and requirements to fly is on our interactive map at https://t.co/OXUH9Lzr8P. https://t.co/aHeyC9WCzS

data.text: @adriamebanita Hi, we just sent you a message by DM. Regards!

@thekrzi Hello, please send us via DM your booking reference (6 letters), ticket number (13 digits) and full name of the passenger to check this with you further. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@BondeKristan Hello, we apologize for the inconveniences. Let us know via DM if you still need our assistance or if your requirement was resolved. We will stay tuned.
@Audubon_hanj Hi, please DM more details of what happened. Be sure to include the reservation code and the names on the booking. We look forward to your response. Regards.
@Rafael_Souza07 Hi Rafael, thanks for contacting us. Please send us your reservation code and the full name of the passenger through direct message in order to look into your situation.

@pardonmyaccent Hello, we encourage you to submit your concerns about your experience in the following link: https://t.co/tnLMRMMis9, and in this way we can take the corresponding actions that allow us to improve our service. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@wpava13 Hello, we would like to verify her case, please provide us by DM her reservation code, ticket number and the full name of the passenger. Regards.

We will add 28 A320Neo aircraft to our fleet soon, completing a total order for 70 aircraft from the Airbus family. Their technology and efficiency allow us to become more eco-friendly and reach a more sustainable future. #WhatMakesUsFly https://t.co/MM3ZNNdTyq https://t.co/rwwSY9uNk7

data.text: @diegobelde Hola Diego, tu caso sigue aún bajo gestión. Vamos a estar insistiendo en él para que se pueda agilizar lo más pronto posible. Ante cualquier novedad, vía correo electrónico te estaremos notificando. Sentimos las demoras.

@colarte516 Hola, para el ingreso a Chile se requiere pruebas, cuarentena y formularios. Además, cada pasajero debe pre-registrarse electrónicamente antes de la salida. Puedes revisar el detalle aquí: https://t.co/BjTjEKC8pG colocas país de origen y destino. Saludos.

data.text: @HomesByAmerica Hi, thanks for contacting us. Please contact us through direct message with your case number, in order to check what is the status of your requirement. We await your reply.
@coaniquem Es un privilegio para nosotros poder apoyar a Coaniquem en su labor. ¡Estamos muy felices! Trabajar juntos es #EsoQueNosHaceVolar ✈️❤️💙

@TinaPalaguachi Hi, sometimes the functioning of our website may be affected, so we suggest you delete cookies and browsing history, change your browser or try to purchase from another device. Likewise, if the problem continues, please let us know via DM. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@mvriavc Hi, we would like to let you know that we can also assist you through this means. Please tell us how can we help you. We await your reply.

@FueledByYelyah Hello, the air routes are arranged by the regulations of the aeronautical authorities of each country, as soon as we have the route you mention, we will show it through our official channels. Regards.

@rachael_ahava Hi Rachael, please provide us by private message the case number if you have it and the reservation code with the full name of the passenger in order to check the information. We will stay tuned.
@mamma0113 Hi, we've answered you by DM. Regards.
@diegobelde Hola, envíanos un DM con el código de reserva y número de caso. Saludos.
@GADIF Hola, te hemos respondido por DM. Saludos.
@GADIF Hola, te hemos dejado un mensaje vía DM.
@GADIF Hola Gadi, cuéntanos por un DM más detalles sobre tu situación y envíanos el número de caso que registras para poder asistirte de una mejor manera. Estaremos atentos a tu mensaje. Saludos.

@thekrzi Hi Vincent, as a matter of fact, Delta's Platinum members have benefits such as free seat selection (standard seats), and an additional piece of luggage. You might want to contact Delta, as they have more information on their benefits when traveling with us. Regards.

data.text: @sambaxrock Hello, pleased to greet you. Please send us through DM your email address. We'll stay tuned. Regards.
@JIP305 Hello, please send us the booking reference (6 letters) and name of the passenger via DM to check this with you further. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@ani_Jaramillo96 Nos alegra saber que se solucionó tu caso 👏

@fabbybernal48 Hola, entendemos lo que nos indicas, sin embargo la responsabilidad de devolución de boletos comprados en agencias de viajes radica exclusivamente en la misma agencia de viajes. Nosotros te podemos ayudar siempre y que el boleto se compre directamente a la aerolínea. Saludos.

@ChiAlma Hi, in order to assist you please send us via DM the reservation code (6 capital letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and please confirm the passenger's full name. We'll be awaiting your response. Regards.

@deliari Hi, in order to verify if there is any payment attempt in our records, send us via DM your full name, flight route and date, and the email address you were trying to use to make the purchase. We will be awaiting your response. Regards.
@Pa_Labra Hello, in order to assist you, please provide us by DM your case number, reservation code and the full name of the passenger. We will stay tuned.
@GeiseZa Hi, we have sent you a message by DM. Kind regards.
@Edit_Tape We’ll stay tuned for your future consultations. Regards.
@Edit_Tape Hi, please send us via DM your LATAM Pass number, birthday, email address, residence country and last movement in your account. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.

@BackhomeLC Hi, to assist you with the document, tell us more information via DM. Additionally, yes, we do, to register that send us via DM the reservation code or the ticket number and please confirm the passenger's full name. We'll be awaiting your response. Regards.
@gabizinhadantas We have sent you a message via DM. Regards.
@gabizinhadantas Hi, to protect your information we recommend you delete the comments and write us back via DM to assist you. We'll be awaiting your response. Regards.
@guguspeaks Hello, we have sent you a request through DM. Regards.
@cruise_yolo Hello, please send us further information via DM to check this with your. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.

Such pride to be able to tell the world that Marta Vieira da Silva is now flying with us. Marta is our new Global Diversity and Inclusion Leader to strengthen these pillars and build together an increasingly plural group. Having an icon on board is #WhatMakesUsFly #MartaWithLATAM https://t.co/oMq8G84kv4

data.text: @Luciano27258659 Hello, the status of your case is open, we have added internal notes for it to be reviewed. Thanks for your comprehension.

@fabbybernal48 Hola, sugerimos ocultar tus comentarios ya que contienen tu información personal. Por otro lado, el ticket fue emitido por una agencia de viajes. Por tal motivo, deberás solicitar la devolución comunicándote con ellos. Saludos.

@albah1 Hello, our intention is always to provide the best service to our passengers. Your comments are appreciated and taken into account, we invite you to complete our contact form in the following link: https://t.co/4G7wd1TilM. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@WPSBoozetender Michael, we have sent you a message via inbox on Facebook. Regards.
@JoseLionelVelez Please send us this information by DM.
@JoseLionelVelez Hello, in order to assist you, please provide us your reservation code and the full name of the passenger. Kind regards.

@Luciano27258659 Hi Luciano, in order to help you with the refund, please send us via DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.

@nostrabamus69 Hola, sentimos lo ocurrido, si deseas por medio del siguiente enlace: https://t.co/yj7W8HK2F6, puedes generar tu reclamo formal por lo sucedido, esperamos en una próxima oportunidad no tengas este inconveniente. Saludos.
@camby_paz Hola, te hemos enviado un mensaje a tu DM. Saludos.
@GonzalesEilleen We have sent you a message by DM. Regards.
@fabbybernal48 Hola, verificamos que tu boleto aéreo fue adquirido mediante una agencia de viaje. Deberás solicitar la devolución directamente con ellos. Saludos.
@BackhomeLC Hi, our Contact Center number is 1 866 435 9526. More information: https://t.co/b7lCaAiUU0. Regards.

Today, more than ever, keeping you informed is #WhatMakesUsFly. Get to know in detail our updated policies regarding changes and refunds here: https://t.co/LguHnysxHD so that you can find the alternative that best suits you when you travel again. ✅✈ https://t.co/QQG3U9HQFG

data.text: @millavedder Hello, pleased to greet you. In order to assist you, send us through DM the reservation code (six uppercase letters) and/or electronic ticket number with the full name of one of the passengers. We'll be aware of your response. Regards.
@B4Armageddon Hola, te hemos respondido por DM. Saludos.

@B4Armageddon Hola, con el fin de brindarte asistencia, es necesario que nos indiques vía DM si cuentas con número de caso o el código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 dígitos numéricos) y el nombre completo de los pasajeros. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

We want to keep you informed about the mandatory requirements to travel. You must check the details of entry, departure, and connections for each destination. Learn about the most important steps in this #ChecklistLATAM and get to know the details at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp https://t.co/KAhmhHEnlN

data.text: @Lexi1217x In order to assist you please send us via DM the reservation code (6 capital letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and please confirm the passenger's full name. We'll be awaiting your response. Regards.
@Lexi1217x Hi, for a proper assistance, please choose just one language Spanish, English or Portuguese. Thank you. We'll be awaiting your response.
@vanessa_kasilva Hello, please send us via DM your refund request number to review this with you further. Thank you for contacting us, we’ll stay tuned. Regards.
@Jeffrey_Mayhew Hi Jeff, we've verified the case, and we don't have an update yet, but as soon as we do, we'll let you know through your email. We apologize for the time it has taken. Regards.
@maniguenice Hi Maria, if you are having issues right now with our Contact Center, please tall us what type of assistance you need, and we will help you. https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS
